name: typedoc-plugin-markdown-pages
description: A Typedoc plugin that lets you integrate custom markdown pages into your documentation output

scripts.build:example: npm run clean:example && typedoc --out ./example-project-documentation ./example-project/src --name StudentAPI --readme ./example-project/documentation/README.md --logger console --mdPagesSourceDir ./example-project/documentation/pages/ --theme ./src/theme/
scripts.example: npm run build && npm run prepare:plugin && npm run build:example
scripts.prepare:plugin: npm run clean:plugin && npm run copy:plugin

author: Mike Patterson
